docs.text: Quick start Plug the micro:bit into a free USB port on your computer It should appear as a USB drive on the file manager No driver installation necessary (on most computers) Open the MicroPython code editor: https://tech.microbit.org/software/micropython/ Get started with your first program Click the Download button to compile it into a .hex file Put the .hex file on your micro:bit The program will launch automatically
